game.name: RoboDeal Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 얼어붙은 행성 자이라리스-9에서 로봇을 설계하고 제작하며 거래하세요. 로보딜 시뮬레이터에서 세력에 복무하고 시설을 업그레이드하며 로봇 유산을 만들어가세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Design, craft, and trade robots on the frozen world of Xylaris-9. Serve factions, upgrade your facility, and shape your robotic legacy in Robodeal Simulator.
